name: Squorp demo
description:
A quick and fun adventure, in which you, Squorp, will try to expose the evil plans of Franco the slime. Venture through this 3D land, and most importantly, have fun :)

note: this is a demo, as of today you can only go through the overworld, interact with npcs and enter the farm. New content coming soon :)

CONTROLS:
use W A S D or arrow keys to move, space to jump, E to interact and ESC to pause
